post.text: Imagine a president who said all of these things.

comment.author: Anastasia
comment.text: Hillary Clinton I voted for you, I believe these ads should just be played on commercials. I believe its time to put out more ads about what you are planning for this country to remind us what we have to look forward to. Talk about the more controversial stuff in detail, like guns laws, free trade, boarder policy, and abortions.

replies.author: Anastasia
replies.text: Ashley Weaver she may win and deserves to, she won't be impeached either.

replies.author: Chanel
replies.text: I hear ya. The negativity is getting old. But these ads have much more impact. We simply cannot have Trump in the Oval Office. She addressed ALL of the issues you mentioned during the debates. Also, you can go to her website to learn more or call/visit a Democratic HQ near you.
